Privacy Policy

Amberbrook Toys is owned by Amberbrook Sdn Bhd ("Amberbrook") and is committed to safeguarding your privacy online. We understand the importance of privacy to our customers and visitors to Amberbrook websites. Our use of personally identifiable information is governed by our Privacy Policy and by accessing and using Amberbrook websites, you agree to be bound by that Privacy Policy.

You recognize and agree that when submitting your personally identifiable information to Amberbrook websites, while Amberbrook has safeguards in place to prevent unauthorized access or interception, there is no absolute guarantee of security.

In the unlikely event of an interception or unauthorized access despite our efforts, Amberbrook shall not be responsible for such interceptions or unauthorised access, or any direct, indirect, special, incidental, or consequential damages (including lost profits) suffered by a customer or user.

Even if Amberbrook has previously been advised of the possibility of such damages, Amberbrook does not warrant, either expressly or implied, that the information provided by any customer shall be free from interception or unauthorized access, and does not provide any implied warranties of merchantibility and fitness for a particular purpose. Each customer is responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of his or her own password.
